name: allowInterrupt
description:
Allows interruption of the current fiber, even in uninterruptible regions.
*Details This effect checks whether any other fibers are attempting to interrupt the
current fiber. If so, it allows the current fiber to perform a
self-interruption.
*When to Use This is useful in situations where you want to allow interruption to happen
even in regions of the code that are normally uninterruptible.
